history.proof: intros u. hauto lq: on use: @residue_exists, @residue_extensible, @join_comm.

original: intros u. specialize (SeparationAlgebra worlds J) as SAprop. specialize (DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds R J) as dSAprop. specialize (ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds R J) as resSAprop. specialize (SAprop u) as [e SAe]. specialize (dSAprop u) as [v dSAv]. specialize (resSAprop u) as [v' resSAv']. exists e, v. apply J.
